Package main.java

Class ChessTimer

java.lang.Object
main.java.ChessTimer
public class ChessTimer extends Object
Represents a Chess timer with decrementing time. Additionally implements time increment: when a player makes a move, they get n amount of time back. Used to manage the time for each player as the game progresses.

    Constructors

    Description
    ChessTimer(int startTime, int increment)
    Constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    activate()
    Activates the timer, allowing it to decrement when decrementTime() is called.
    void
    addIncrement()
    Adds the time increment to the remaining time.
    void
    deactivate()
    Deactivates the timer, preventing it from decrementing when decrementTime() is called.
    void
    decrementTime()
    Decrements the remaining time by one second if the timer is active and there is time remaining.
    String
    getFormattedTime()
    Returns the remaining time in a formatted string (MM:SS)
    void
    setIncrement(int increment)
    Sets the time increment value.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChessTimer

      public ChessTimer(int startTime, int increment)
      Constructor. Initializes the timer with a start time and time increment.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The starting time for the timer in seconds.
      increment - The time increment added after each move in seconds.

  • Method Details

    • getFormattedTime

      public String getFormattedTime()
      Returns the remaining time in a formatted string (MM:SS)
      Returns:
      A string representing the formatted remaining time.

    • decrementTime

      public void decrementTime()
      Decrements the remaining time by one second if the timer is active and there is time remaining.

    • activate

      public void activate()
      Activates the timer, allowing it to decrement when decrementTime() is called.

    • deactivate

      public void deactivate()
      Deactivates the timer, preventing it from decrementing when decrementTime() is called.

    • addIncrement

      public void addIncrement()
      Adds the time increment to the remaining time. Called after a move is made in the game.

    • setIncrement

      public void setIncrement(int increment)
      Sets the time increment value.
      Parameters:
      increment - The time increment in seconds.
